errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.
  --> contracts/SelfDestructContract.sol:14:9:
   |
14 |         selfdestruct(recipient);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^

ForceTransfer.metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address payable","name":"recipient","type":"address"}],"name":"force","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@YamenMerhi @PatronumLabs","custom:security":"EIP-6049 deprecated selfdestruct as it may be subject to breaking changes in the future, use on your own risk","details":"Utilizes a self-destructing contract to bypass recipient limitations","kind":"dev","methods":{"force(address)":{"custom:security":"This function will always succeed, given enough gas, even if the recipient is a contract without a receive function","details":"Creates a new SelfDestructContract with the amount being sent and the specified recipient","params":{"recipient":"The address to receive the value"}}},"title":"ForceTransfer","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"force(address)":{"notice":"Forces value transfer to a specified recipient"}},"notice":"A contract that provides a method to forcefully send value to any address","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/ForceTransfer.sol":"ForceTransfer"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"none"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":10000000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/ForceTransfer.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ea0a9e689c9f38c887d2f5826837ec9134ceeaa0070d1b920e5893de0a1f359","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://548165ba94a63f4a890c26e02f395c301a4ea879e4c05aa04c946c83e0842c37","dweb:/ipfs/QmQ3z4Pg4c5d8D6Pt8fC8tXnt44SPE3ykuwMANEEzgec15"]},"contracts/SelfDestructContract.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfd25284a0103f7f391b3bc446248ba90a5ac8f09238feae62ed3432d502622cb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://edcd25ef217894c747e311b31e64ab094738d97ab4f943728e07ff7b1ea93cea","dweb:/ipfs/QmbZEJ7ba8uec1RywrbcFAgoRBxsRcJoZbX5LkgdpZ1v52"]}},"version":1}
